page.title: 02A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: A Family Weekend {Sunday}Mum and Dad both get up earlier on a Sunday.Dad always goes to work for an hour on a Sunday.While Dad is at work,Mum and Julie are preparing dinner.I sometimes go and help going to count the cows and calves.After dinner Dad and Mum have a sit down and watch television while we play out.In the evening we get changed.We always go out on a Sunday night.We go to the "Butcher's Nook Club"which is in the village called Hemswell.At about a quarter to nine bingo starts.At about a quarter to eleven bingo has finished,so we go home.My family lives in a quite isolated area near the river Ancholme.Our few neighbours live over two hundred metres away.
